title: Don't Let the Bedbugs Bite 2 - Critters, Jitters and Shivers
description: If you enjoyed Don’t Let The Bedbugs Bite, then you’re going to be Ecstatic over Bedbugs 2; Critters, Jitters, and Shivers. Welcome to the Greenman’s world; where Bedbugs, Monsters, and Scary Kids go hand in hand. Creepy Katy, Molly’s Dolly and Teething Tiny are just waiting for you to come inside and play with them. “If you do,” you can meet some of their other friends. Scaredy Cat, Rollie Pollie, and the Maw Man. If you haven’t read the Greenman’s first Bedbug book; I Highly Suggest that you do before making such a deadly decision. They are not the only ones who live on the block, and there are other things that creep inside the houses beside them. And They're All Out To Get You. So, try not to get scared when they go BOO; or they will kill you too. “By the way,” please don’t mind the clowns in my upper photo; they Insisted on coming. I can’t seem to go anywhere without them.
author: E.A. Green/The Greenman
